long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upload custom images on HuskyCT, Overhauled StudentAdmin, and NetID Login

UConn Cosmetics allows you to upload custom images to HuskyCT, and overhauls the look of StudentAdmin and the netid sign on page

The UConn Cosmetics extension is an independent project and is not affiliated, endorsed, or sponsored by the University of Connecticut or its official entities.
